name: Rolly's Conundrum
description:
Embark on this adventure with Rolly, the rolling sphere, transforming in size and elements to solve 20 levels of puzzly goodness! 

Made solo by Carlos Xavier: carlos.es.sxs@gmail.com

All assets apart from the 5 music used in the game were made by me during the game jam.

The music were created by Rolemusic and are available for download and use at: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/Straw_Fields/
